column1: Sagua de Tánamo (Spanish pronunciation: [ˈsaɣwa ðe ˈtamano]) is a municipality and town in the Holguín Province of Cuba.

The Sierra Cristal National Park (Spanish: Parque Nacional Sierra Cristal) is partly located in the Sagua de Tánamo municipality and partly in neighboring Mayarí.The municipality is divided into the barrios of Barrederas

column2: the municipality of Sagua de Tánamo had a population of 52
column3: 013. With a total area of 704 km2 (272 sq mi)
column4: it has a population density of 73.9/km2 (191/sq mi).
